bibl.title: Euripides. VIII. Fragments. Oedipus - Chrysippus. Other Fragments.
bibl.seg: COLLARD Christopher and Martin CROPP (Edited and Translated by), Euripides. VIII. Fragments. Oedipus - Chrysippus. Other Fragments. (Loeb Classical Library. 506.)
Cambridge, Mass. - London, Harvard University Press, 2008, 8°, xxiv-710 pp. ISBN 978-0-674-99631-1. $24.
C.R. par Rebecca Lämmle, MusHelv 66 (2009) pp. 234-235 [concerne aussi: Euripides. VII. Fragments. Aegeus - Meleager (Cambridge, Mass. - London, 2008)].
